post:
Hello,

[SwitchVM](https://www.switchvm.com) has been in operation nearly a month now (2 days away). We have been growing in size, and are bringing you this special offer. This will be the last offer of this kind posted by us on LET for a while. In 2 weeks (when the next offer is posted), prices will have been increased quite a bit and there won't be anything as good as the double space/bandwidth offer.

Location: Phoenix, Arizona

**Offers:**

Submit a ticket to get double hard disk space, and bandwidth!

**LET Special Packages:**

_LET-256:_

Disk Space: 15GB **(Doubled to 30GB)**
Bandwidth: 500GB **(Doubled to 1TB)**
RAM/vSwap: 256MB/512MB
CPU Cores: 4
IP Addresses: 1
Virtualization: OpenVZ
Port Speed: 100Mbps
Operating System: Linux (choice)

Price: $3.25 per month
Order URL: https://www.switchvm.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=10

--

_LET-512:_

Disk Space: 30GB **(Doubled to 60GB)**
Bandwidth: 500GB **(Doubled to 1TB)**

CPU Cores: 4
IP Addresses: 1

Port Speed: 100Mbps
Operating System: Linux (choice)

Price: $5.00 per month

--

_LET-1024:_

CPU Cores: 4

--

Control panel is SolusVM.
Test IP: 199.231.86.162

Limited stock so be quick!
